verbs.description: holocaust memorial [V: is] defaced less than a day after residents of skokie and others reverently dedicated a monument to victims of the nazi holocaust they returned monday to the village green to ponder why the sculpture had been defaced with anti - semitic symbols skokie skokie illinois holocaust
